mapper.update: update bg_request_log set login_unit_no ='0' where user_name=#{userName} and unit_no='fail' and login_unit_no = '1'
mapper.select: select count(1) from bg_request_log where user_name = #{userName} and request_path = '/user/login.do' and unit_no='fail' and login_unit_no = '1' and request_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -30 MINUTE)
